value.title: Do I need to be an expert in Power Query M?
value.excerpt: Maybe you've heard of Power Query M in Microsoft Excel, Power BI or something else. Do you really need to be an expert in that? Or even use it? Patrick helps to ease your mind!  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want to take your Power BI skills to the next

value.excerpt: Have you really used the Power BI model view? Patrick walks through some of things he loves about it. value.title: FAST - Billions of rows with Azure Data Explorer (ADX)
value.excerpt: Have you tried Azure Data Explorer? We look at how ADX can support large amounts of data and query at blazing fast speeds. it truly is BANANAS! And you can try it for FREE!  Connect with Tzvia: https://www.linkedin.com/in/tzvia/ https://twitter.com/tzvia  What is Azure Data Explorer? https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/data-explorer/data-explorer-overview
